test.name: RT: repeated delete

sphqueries.sphinxql: insert into rt (id, id1, title) values (1, 1, 'test text')
delete from rt where id=1
delete from rt where id=1
insert into rt (id, id1, title) values (2, 2, 'test text')
delete from rt where id=2
delete from rt where id=2
